values: 有感染力，有吸引力；诉诸，求助；上诉，申诉
To appeal to someone is to be interesting or attractive.
Sleeping all day appeals to me, but I have to go to school.
呼吁

上诉， 申诉； 呼吁， 恳求； 感染力， 吸引力
To appeal is to request or seek for a favorable decision or action.
Appeal is the quality of being attractive or interesting, or the act of asking for a decision to be changed.
